name: bj-modssabl

body.origin:
|- wss(clmod, cabl)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cabl))
-| diffsc(hs0, clmod)
-| diffsc(hs0, cabl)
body.pretty:
⊢ LMod ⊆ Abel
⊣ (hs0 ∈ LMod → hs0 ∈ Abel)
⊣ d(hs0, LMod)
⊣ d(hs0, Abel)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(clmod, cabl)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cabl))
-| diffsc(hs0, clmod)
-| diffsc(hs0, cabl)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ LMod ⊆ Abel
⊣ (hs0 ∈ LMod → hs0 ∈ Abel)
⊣ d(hs0, LMod)
⊣ d(hs0, Abel)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(clmod, cabl)
-| diffsc(hs0, clmod)
-| diffsc(hs0, cabl)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ LMod ⊆ Abel
⊣ d(hs0, LMod)
⊣ d(hs0, Abel)

comment: (The additive groups of) modules are abelian groups. (The elemental version is ~ lmodabl ; see also ~ lmodgrp and ~ lmodcmn .) (Contributed by BJ, 9-Jun-2019.)
